name: Extreme Traffic Motorbike Pro
description:
Extreme Traffic Motorbike Pro is a OpenWorld Motorbike Game.

If you like Simulator Games, Free Drive, Drifting, Crushing try it.
Smooth controls, realistic car physics, realistic traffic system.
Test your real drive skills.

***FEATURES***

* Easy controllers
* Huge MAP
* 15+ MISSIONS
* Traffic Cars on the streets
* Realistic driving experience and feelings
* Beautiful Graphics
* Realistic sound environment
* Realistic physics
* FULL HD graphics with high quality
